title: Science Fair Project
description: A master template to guide students through a complete science fair project using the scientific method from hypothesis to conclusion and reflection.

hypotheses.description: State your testable prediction. Use an If... then... because... format.

materials.description: List every item, tool, and resource required, including quantities and safety equipment.

experiment.description: Step-by-step procedure. Include variables (independent, dependent, controls) and number of trials.

observation & data.description: Record qualitative observations and quantitative data (tables, measurements, timestamps).

results.description: Summarize analyzed data (averages, graphs, trends). No interpretations yet.

conclusion.description: State whether the hypothesis was supported or not, explain why, mention errors and improvements.

questions & research.description: Background research, related questions, and references to sources consulted.

video.description: Link to demonstration or presentation video (URL).

headshots.description: Image URLs or file references for team member headshots.
